title: Cannabis Collection - HC - The Marijuana Revolution
description:
Here is a new recent docu about medical cannabis. Please also try one of the other dvd's from the Cannabis Collection for more information.


The Cannabis Collection - a series of educative and entertaining info dvd's

Please enjoy, share with friends and seed :)

Marijuana in America is undergoing a seismic shift. Take a look inside the labyrinth of the new cannabis industry-where it's been, where it is now and where it's going. 

Documentary â€˜The Marijuana Revolutionâ€˜, which looks at the history of cannabis use in America, the forty-five year effort to reform prohibition laws, the dramatic increase in public support recently to finally re-legalize the herbal drug and the hundreds of companies already cultivating, infusing, testing, marketing and selling cannabis-related products.

Useful links to research:
 
http://www.sfgate.com/health/article/Pot-compound-seen-as-tool-against-cancer-3875562.php

http://mct.aacrjournals.org/content/6/11/2921.abstract
  
http://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/bph.2010.160.issue-3/issuetoc
  
http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/20859676
